title: (x) Four Musketeers script - Lorrenne (Lys Calligraph) {Patricia}
content:
Hi,

Can anyone identify this infuriatingly flourishy font?

cheers,  
Rich T

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Musketeers.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107044124/http:/typophile.com/files/Musketeers.gif) | 12.15 KB |
author: trajkov

comments.content: Argh! I always forget its name! Mike Yanega will know for sure.

That's Lorrenne. Used to be called Lys Calligraph among other things.

More info here  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/8503](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107044124/http:/www.typophile.com/node/8503 "http://www.typophile.com/node/8503")

Edit: but the first link in the earlier thread is dead. Try this link, where the font is called "Windsor Sword"  
 [http://www.qbf.de/dceng.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20111107044124/http:/www.qbf.de/dceng.htm "http://www.qbf.de/dceng.htm")
Wow, that was fast. Many thanks :)
